issue.title: Darknet issue trying to run slimyolov3

repository.name: pytorch-yolo-v3
repository.description: A PyTorch implementation of the YOLO v3 object detection algorithm

issue.body:
I dowload this weights and cfg:
https://github.com/PengyiZhang/SlimYOLOv3

original tensor size: torch.Size([1, 3, 608, 608])

I got this error:

with map1 and map2 with sizes in darknet.py file:
torch.Size([1, 12, 2, 2])
torch.Size([1, 12, 3, 3])

  File "/home/aras/Desktop/rosas/savia/monitor/yolo/darknet.py", line 341, in forward
    x = torch.cat((map1, map2), 1)
RuntimeError: invalid argument 0: Sizes of tensors must match except in dimension 1. Got 3 and 2 in dimension 2

body: @www12345678 video results are saved automatically along with image results if `save_img=True` in detect.py.

@www12345678 if you want to display video results at the same time as saving the results, then you should try and reproduce the webcam display functionality already embedded in detect.py which does this.

The functionality you seek is not available "off the shelf" unfortunately, but is easy to code in detect.py.

@glenn-jocher
I have a question I would like to ask you, if I increase the img-size in train.py, will it increase the mAP？why?

@www12345678 it depends on your training set. You can extract the most information at the native image resolution of course, so if your hardware allows it img-sizes as large as your training image native resolution will produce the highest mAP. On COCO this is about 600-700 pixels.

@www12345678 I think I already answered this:

You can extract the most information at the native image resolution of course, so if your hardware allows it img-sizes as large as your training image native resolution will produce the highest mAP. On COCO this is about 600-700 pixels.
@H-YunHui I'm closing the issue for now.

> @glenn-jocher
> yeah,I know what your mean, and also I have another question.
> During the detection process, the image resolution was 1280*720, if I increase the img-size in detect.py, will it works better?
hello, could you please share the video code? I also want to display video results at the same time as saving the results. Thank you !
want to display video results at the same time as saving the results
